## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT1G06790](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT1G06790)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>NRPC7</u>
- **Gene Name:** NUCLEAR RNA POLYMERASE C, SUBUNIT 7
- **Description:**   RNA polymerase Rpb7 N-terminal domain-containing protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2033077
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
